cards.rules_text:
Whenever you draw a card other the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, put a loyalty counter on Parathrak, Shadow Archivist.
[-2]: You gain 2 life and each opponent loses 2 life.

[-2]: You gain 2 life and each opponent loses 2 life.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a source you control deals damage to you, put a loyalty counter on Gruthar, Bloody Flame.

Lifelink
Leeching Slash deals damage equal to its potency to any target.

Multikicker—Counter a spell you control. [i](You may counter a spell you control in addition to any other costs any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When you cast ? Reapstorm, double its potency for each time it was kicked. 
? Reapstorm deals damage equal to its potency to any target.

Spellward {1} [i](Whenever this spell becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
Warded Slash deals damage equal to its potency to any target.

Create six copies of Slice. You may cast up to three of them without paying their mana costs. You may cast the rest. [i](Slice is a {1} Strike instant with potency 1 and “Slice deals damage equal to its potency to any target.”)[/i]

You get a flare counter. [i](Whenever you cast a spell with potency, if you have any flare counters, you may pay any amount of flare counters to increase that spell's potency by 1 per counter paid this way)[/i]

{W}: Exile Wu'kom's Preparatory Slash from your hand. You may cast it for as long as it remains in exile.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell while Wu'kom's Preparatory Slash is in exile, put a mirage counter on it.
When you cast Wu'kom's Preparatory Slash from exile, increase its potency by 1 for each mirage counter that was on it.
Wu'kom's Preparatory Slash deals damage equal to its potency to any target.

Kicker—Counter a spell you control. [i](You may counter a spell you control in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)[/i]
